ISSUE.TITLE: Remove some unused methods
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: develop Remove some unused methods from services and appropriate interfaces (marked with `//TODO: Delete unused method` and `//TODO: may be deleted`). But be sure that they are not actually used anywhere (including in plugins, tests, views, etc).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5054 Fixed problem with the definition of AdditionalNameCompatibilities Property (cherry picked from commit 6195c569d2f977880879c2dc46e1b16f13387b9c)
